page.title: 06THE BAKERY
page.content:
Mr Pullen is a master baker.
His Dad and Grandad were bakers before him.
When we went to the bakery we saw big machines. We saw the big bread oven. We saw a man making sausage rolls. There was a man making jam tarts. The baking that Mr Pullen does is French Sticks, and Wholemeal and Cottage loaves, finger leaves, granary bread, doughnuts, pasties, marshmallow ice creams and cakes.
When we went to the bakery we saw big bags of flour. One of the men put a whole bag of flour into a big mixing bowl. There are lots and lots of bags of flour. Mr Pullen gave us some bread to eat.
